subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Shameka Christon, 26, is a veteran on the W.N.B.A.’s youngest team and is one of only two players who were with the Liberty the last time it went to the conference finals.
snippet: Shameka Christon, 26, is a veteran on the W.N.B.A.’s youngest team and is one of only two players who were with the Liberty the last time it went to the conference finals.
